name: Mohammadali Rahnama
title: Computer Engineer with Strong Testing & Automation Background
profile: Dedicated computer engineer with extensive testing and automation experience. Educated in various levels of computer engineering and science. Experienced in working with Agile methodology and practices, with a strong background in software quality assurance and development. Exceptional analytical, evaluative, and perceptual skills, with excellent communication and problem-solving abilities.

responsibilities: Collaborated with a multinational team employing SAFe® methodologies to improve software quality.
Designed and implemented 300+ automated test cases for both UI and API, ensuring robust testing across all features.
Optimized the testing process by automating dummy data generation, significantly reducing manual testing efforts.
Analyzed 500+ test execution results to identify issues and collaborate with team members to ensure timely resolution.
Maintained thorough documentation of test processes and results to support quality assurance practices within the team.
achievements: Automated Fleet Management features, boosting testing efficiency and reducing cycle times.
Expanded UI and API automation, increasing overall project quality and reliability.
Reduced pipeline execution time by 66%, from 3 hours to 1 hour.
Increased automation coverage to over 90%, advancing towards full automation.

responsibilities: Executed and analyzed 200+ manual and automated test cases, leading to swift rectification of software issues.
Updated and evaluated 100+ product documentations, ensuring precision and relevance.
Reported 50+ software bugs and errors promptly to the development team, minimizing potential software malfunctions.
Collaborated with team leads and developers to design 20+ test strategies and plans, enhancing overall efficiency.
Worked with developers in 20+ bug troubleshooting cases, expediting root cause analysis.
Conducted rigorous pre-release testing, ensuring the software met high-quality standards.
achievements: Supported quality standards in cross-functional teams across the software lifecycle.
Received recognition for outstanding co-op performance with a formal commendation.
Completed Certified SAFe® 5 Practitioner training, enhancing agile team capabilities.

responsibilities: Developed and launched a full-featured online printing platform, providing a comprehensive digital service.
Established an online art gallery, enabling easy browsing and purchasing experience for 1000+ high-quality artworks.
Overcame various business obstacles using a proactive and persistent approach, leveraging problem-solving skills.
Created 100+ visual elements, such as logos and images, which contributed to the unique and attractive user interfaces.
Maintained and updated the content management systems of the websites, ensuring they remained current and user-friendly.
achievements: Registered a unique brand by 2018, securing a strong market presence (Brand ID: 139750140001060310).
Negotiated partnerships, establishing beneficial collaborations across business phases.
Drove consistent revenue growth, expanding both businesses by 25% through quality services.

projects.title: On-call Tracking System
projects.description: Served as the Product Owner in a collaborative team of 10 students. Held 20+ meetings with the client to identify user stories, generated additional stories and added acceptance tests.

projects.title: Database vs Data Warehouse, A Cloud-based Benchmarking Platform for IoT Big Data
projects.description: Created an extensible cloud-based benchmarking platform for IoT data warehousing. Evaluated the performance of PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Amazon Redshift Data Warehouse.

projects.title: Is there a correlation between life expectancy and Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per capita of countries in the UN?
projects.description: Analyzed the correlation between GDP per capita and life expectancy for 193 UN member states using statistical analysis capabilities of R.

education.degree: Postgraduate Certificate of Advanced Computer Science

certifications.title: Pilot Certificate – Small Remotely Piloted Aircraft (VLOS)
